TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit DataProtectionPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public NotInheritable Class DataProtectionPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission Implements IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class DataProtectionPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: 控制访问加密数据和内存的权限。

span.span: Controls the ability to access encrypted data and memory.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此权限用于控制可加密数据和内存使用和类。This permission is used to control the ability to encrypt data and memory using the and classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建`None`（完全受限制） 或`Unrestricted`访问数据和内存。Creates either `None` (fully restricted) or `Unrestricted` access to data and memory. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了利用构造函数。The following code example shows the use of the constructor. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 创建并返回当前权限的相同副本。

span.span: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
A copy of the current permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 权限的副本与原始权限资源表示相同的访问权限。A copy of the permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了利用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例旨在演示方法，不是为了演示其用法的行为。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 安全基础结构; 一般情况下，使用权限类的方法它们通常不使用应用程序中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. summary.span: 获取或设置数据和内存保护标志。

A bitwise combination of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Intersect(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Intersect (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要与当前权限相交的权限。

span.span: A permission to intersect with the current permission.

param.span: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: It must be the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 创建并返回一个权限，该权限是当前权限与指定权限的交集。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 表示当前权限和指定权限的交集的一个新权限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果交集为空，则此新权限为 。

span.span: This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下两个权限的交集是描述组的二者共同描述的操作的权限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 只有通过两个权限的请求将通过该交集。Only a demand that passes both individual permissions will pass the intersection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了利用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean

param.name: target
param.span: 将要测试子集关系的权限。

span.span: A permission to test for the subset relationship.

param.span: 此权限必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: This permission must be the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 确定当前权限是否为指定权限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果当前权限是指定权限的子集，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前权限指定一组完全包含的操作中指定的权限，则当前的权限是指定权限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained in the specified permission. 例如，权限访问是有关权限的子集访问。For example, a permission for access is a subset of a permission for access. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了利用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例旨在演示方法，不是为了演示其用法的行为。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 安全基础结构; 一般情况下，使用权限类的方法它们通常不使用应用程序中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsUnrestricted() cil managed

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示当前权限是否不受限制。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the current permission is unrestricted.

returns.span: 如果当前权限不受限制，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无限制的权限表示对权限所保护的所有资源的访问权限。An unrestricted permission represents access to all resources protected by the permission. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了利用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. Public Overrides Function Union (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 与当前权限合并的权限。

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

param.span: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 创建一个权限，该权限是当前权限与指定权限的并集。

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 表示同时兼具当前权限和指定权限的新权限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对的调用结果是由当前权限和指定的权限表示所表示的所有操作的权限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all operations represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. 任何请求都会通过任一权限传递其联合。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了利用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例旨在演示方法，不是为了演示其用法的行为。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 安全基础结构; 一般情况下，使用权限类的方法它们通常不使用应用程序中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications.
